string.text: Here I...

About, Marked One! Thanks that has helped to beat off fanatics. I want to offer you something... Namely, the possibility of upgrading the suits of our faction. Also, the installation of night vision devices into suits
it is excellent, it that is necessary...
That you can offer on updating of suits?
The device of night vision...
On what suit to establish the device, on usual or already strengthened at me?
On the usual...
it is excellent... Choose suit model

Greetings, Lanky...

Hi, Marked One! Well, I see you're serious - Barman has informed me that you have documents from Agroprom - the good fellow. I will be glad to offer you the services in updating of the heaviest and claimed Suits of the Zone - Exoskeletons. Namely, we can establish the device of night vision and strengthen plates, having raised wear resistance. Unfortunately, at groupings the updatings of Exoskeletons, features of their structure to us are not known, therefore I not undertake to modify them... Ah yes, Duty Exoskeletons are modified by the former sniper of their group, on Petrenko's surname. If you will agree with the security guard at the entrance on their base - address to it. And with Exoskeletons of neutrals and bandits - I can help. The technology of their manufacturing and feature - to us are known well...
it is excellent, thanks!
That you can offer on updating of suits?
The Device of night vision...
On what Suit to establish the device, on usual or already strengthened by me?
On the usual...
